Nik M

MRI Study

Because of my heart condition which is not so common, the Neuro team at Boston Children's Hospital wanted to do a study on my brain. They wanted to study the affects of TGA on brain development.

Our MRI experience was pretty good. The MRI machine was so loud! But we didn't have any problems throughout the whole process. Here are some pictures of mommy and daddy before the scan.

And here are some of the MRI images of me!
